description: This file defines Pydantic data models for user-related schemas in a web service, including create, update, read, and list response models.

classes.name: UserBase
classes.description: Shared user fields, including name and email.

classes.name: UserCreate
classes.description: Payload model for creating a user, inherits from UserBase.

classes.name: UserUpdate
classes.description: Payload model for updating a user, allows optional name and email.

classes.name: UserRead
classes.description: Response model for user data, includes id, timestamps, and optional deletion timestamp.

classes.name: UserListResponse
classes.description: Envelope for listing users, contains list of UserRead and pagination info.
